name: Natural Habitat
description:
Natural Habitat is a skill-based match-3 card battler aimed at the core gaming audience. It combines match-3 mechanics with turn-based tactics, deck building, and a story-based campaign. The game will challenge you, and you’ll need to pick your troops carefully in order to win the fights.

An interplanetary corporation is feeding off the magic of a faraway planet, corrupting its ecosystem and driving its inhabitants to ruin. Play as rebels who are rising against the corporate invaders. Travel across the different regions, learn more about their inhabitants and recruit them to your side in order to reclaim your Natural Habitat. Find the secrets behind the corporation’s plans and enjoy a world that combines science fiction with fantasy.

Features

  • Challenge yourself with deep match-3 mechanics
  • Large 9x9 game board
  • Use a variety of special gems
  • Randomized content offers good replay value

Build Your Own Arsenal

  • Build your deck by combining cards from seven different colors, all with unique mechanics and strengths
  • Play with four different card types: Troops, Spells, Wards and Traps
  • Enhance your deck with powerful items
  • Collect over 500 cards and 100 items

Play Tactically

  • Keep Your Eye On the Dynamic Battlefield
  • Match gems to gain play cards or gain an edge over your opponent
  • Control the battlefield by positioning your troops
  • Support your fighters with Spells, Wards, and Traps
  • Stay alert, as both turns happen simultaneously

Enjoy the Rich Single-player Campaign

  • Learn about the different decks and the mechanics/lore behind them
  • Battle across the planet, spanning 7 regions
  • Build your army from different colors and characters
  • Explore over 30 different battle maps
  • Fight against challenging enemies and reclaim your home
  • Delve into a story that explores the themes of greed and survival
  • Enjoy a rich world that combines science fiction with fantasy
